persona.name: Executive Team (CXO)
persona.title: Executive Decision Suite
persona.description: Strategic reports focused on market trends, competitive intelligence, and trial success factors for executive decision making.

reports.title: Therapeutic Area Market Landscape Analysis
reports.description: Comprehensive analysis of the current market landscape, pipeline competitors, and strategic opportunities for development programs.

reports.title: Competitive Intelligence Dashboard
reports.description: Interactive dashboard featuring competitor trial activities, key endpoints, success rates, and time-to-market metrics.

reports.title: Trial Design Executive Summary
reports.description: Concise executive summary of optimal trial design, key success factors, resource requirements, and strategic implications.

reports.title: Success Probability Analysis
reports.description: Evidence-based estimation of trial success probability with sensitivity analysis across key design variables.

reports.title: Portfolio Prioritization Framework
reports.description: Data-driven framework for evaluating and prioritizing pipeline assets based on probability of success, resource requirements, and market potential.
